data.title: Rebuilding Together Silicon Valley
data.meta_description: We believe that everyone deserves to live in a safe and healthy home. Through a vast network of volunteers, corporate sponsors, and sub-contractors, Rebuilding Together Silicon Valley (RTSV) provides critical home repairs to over 600 clients per year. In addition, we assist nonprofit organizations with facility maintenance and repairs so that they can dedicate their time and resources to helping our community.

Volunteer At Paint The Town!

Help Paint The Town with us by volunteering your time!

All About Paint The Town

Curious about what to expect at Paint The Town? This blog post has you covered!

Rebuilding Together Silicon Valley has been proudly serving Santa Clara County‚Äôs neighbors in need with essential, no-cost home repairs for more than 30 years.

A Charitable Organization that repairs homes, revitalizes communities & rebuilds lives.

SINCE OUR FOUNDING IN 1991,

5,132 Projects

Thousands of neighbors in need received life-changing support to live more independently at home.

41,384 Volunteers

Volunteers banded together to give 400,000 hours and affect real change in their local communities.

55,527 Repairs

Critical and safety repairs completed to improve health and safety across the greater Silicon Valley.

$14 Million Donations

Private and in-kind contributions addressed the local housing crisis and preserve affordable housing for generations to come.

Check out our latest blog post

Join Rebuilding Together Silicon Valley‚Äôs most dedicated supporters!

Become a member of the Change Order with your monthly gift today.

Rebuilding Together Silicon Valley1 week ago

Join us for National Night Out tonight, 8/6!

Across the country tonight on Tuesday, August 6th, neighborhoods will come together on National Night Out to build community spirit and safety. We‚Äôre excited to be part of the Seven Trees Neighborhood Association‚Äôs #NationalNightOut!

Join us at the Seven Trees Community Center for a resource fair, games, food trucks, live music, and more! We‚Äôll have plenty of RTSV swag, applications for free home repair, and information on how to support our life-changing work.
